title: Episode 18: The Paradox of Forgiveness
description: After more than a decade of brutal civil war, perpetrators and victims attempted to find peace around bonfires across Sierra Leone. This week on Hidden Brain, a story about forgiving the unforgivable, and the cost of reconciliation.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
